/** @jsx jsx */ import { jsx, css } from "@emotion/core" import tw from "twin.macro" import React from "react" import { useSelector } from "react-redux" import { selectorCollection } from "./collectionSlice" const UserInfo = () => { const dateTime = new Date() const collections = useSelector(selectorCollection) const currentDate = dateTime.toDateString() return (

Hello User!

{currentDate}

XXX coins

{collections.length} collections

) } export default UserInfo
